metadata.Title: CVE-2008-5152 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: inmail-show in mh-book 200605 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a (1) /tmp/inmail#####.log or (2) /tmp/inmail#####.stdin temporary file.

notes.Note: jdstrand> per Debian, unsafe code is in example script

criterions.comment: mh-book: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
